test_find_with_dynamic_fields()

Testing search in indexed field methods:

class Movie < ActiveRecord::Base 

  acts_as_solr :fields => [:name, :description, :current_time]

  def current_time
    Time.now.to_s
  end

end

The method current_time above gets indexed as being part of the Movie model and it‘s available for search as well
